619b6b0e0d170e4039614848e071ad6410803701.translated: # 追加のチェックアウトフィールド

metadata.original: # Additional checkout fields

20c65d1f1f1daa7c0a5bdbee5d601f21be9d80ca.original: A common use-case for developers and merchants is to add a new field to the Checkout form to collect additional data about a customer or their order.
20c65d1f1f1daa7c0a5bdbee5d601f21be9d80ca.translated: 開発者やマーチャントにとって一般的なユースケースは、顧客や注文に関する追加データを収集するために、チェックアウトフォームに新しいフィールドを追加することです。

metadata.original: A common use-case for developers and merchants is to add a new field to the Checkout form to collect additional data about a customer or their order.

62ba71aa3d6b7414150f9dfa31e8185346f9b599.original: This document will outline the steps an extension should take to register some additional checkout fields.
62ba71aa3d6b7414150f9dfa31e8185346f9b599.translated: このドキュメントでは、エクステンションがチェックアウトフィールドを追加登録するために取るべき手順を説明します。

metadata.original: This document will outline the steps an extension should take to register some additional checkout fields.

1f3af5ec6be5ed737b160033d603c173d3aeca6f.translated: ## 利用可能なフィールドロケーション

metadata.original: ## Available field locations

956a8ccfff1d2451062fb108e828719c0bcda032.original: Additional checkout fields can be registered in three different places:
956a8ccfff1d2451062fb108e828719c0bcda032.translated: 追加のチェックアウトフィールドは、3つの異なる場所に登録することができます：

metadata.original: Additional checkout fields can be registered in three different places:

6896faf4b3221a7d7945ff5320d49930c9bf552d.original:
| Title                                | Identifier |
| ------------------------------------ | ---------- |
| Contact information                  | **__INLINE_CODE_0__**  |
| Addresses (Shipping **and** Billing) | **__INLINE_CODE_1__**  |
| Order information                    | **__INLINE_CODE_2__**    |

metadata.original:
| Title                                | Identifier |
| ------------------------------------ | ---------- |
| Contact information                  | **__INLINE_CODE_0__**  |
| Addresses (Shipping **and** Billing) | **__INLINE_CODE_1__**  |
| Order information                    | **__INLINE_CODE_2__**    |

47a6d4999f493be99d840eb15638c56f0a3afff0.original: A field can only be shown in one location, it is not possible to render the same field in multiple locations in the same registration.
47a6d4999f493be99d840eb15638c56f0a3afff0.translated: フィールドは1つの場所にしか表示できません。同じ登録で、同じフィールドを複数の場所に表示することはできません。

metadata.original: A field can only be shown in one location, it is not possible to render the same field in multiple locations in the same registration.
### Contact information

7638b14cb24ebefc27427b040a2923cdd5b1b307.original: The contact information section currently renders at the top of the form. It contains the __INLINE_CODE_0__ field and any other additional fields.
7638b14cb24ebefc27427b040a2923cdd5b1b307.translated: 現在、連絡先情報セクションはフォームの一番上に表示されます。__INLINE_CODE_0__フィールドとその他のフィールドが含まれます。

metadata.original: The contact information section currently renders at the top of the form. It contains the __INLINE_CODE_0__ field and any other additional fields.

ab322b35dd54c4bbc41fffdb4c1b28828a966fa3.original: Fields rendered here will be saved to the shopper's account. They will be visible and editable render in the shopper's "Account details" section.
ab322b35dd54c4bbc41fffdb4c1b28828a966fa3.translated: ここでレンダリングされたフィールドは買い物客のアカウントに保存されます。これらのフィールドは買い物客の "アカウント詳細 "セクションに表示され、編集可能です。

metadata.original: Fields rendered here will be saved to the shopper's account. They will be visible and editable render in the shopper's "Account details" section.
### Address

682500f148e362051072451e243641dd34de3d71.original: The "Address" section currently contains a form for the shipping address and the billing address. Additional checkout fields can be registered to appear within these forms.
682500f148e362051072451e243641dd34de3d71.translated: 住所」セクションには現在、配送先住所と請求先住所のフォームがあります。これらのフォームに表示されるように、追加のチェックアウトフィールドを登録することができます。

metadata.original: The "Address" section currently contains a form for the shipping address and the billing address. Additional checkout fields can be registered to appear within these forms.

2a1214a5c97c2f6519a59d5c95fd7dc3602a9249.original: Fields registered here will be saved to both the customer _and_ the order, so returning customers won't need to refill those values again.
2a1214a5c97c2f6519a59d5c95fd7dc3602a9249.translated: ここで登録されたフィールドは、顧客と注文の両方に保存されます。

metadata.original: Fields registered here will be saved to both the customer _and_ the order, so returning customers won't need to refill those values again.

4549b3cda04162be19551f1d924016ba3c81b59d.original: If a field is registered in the __INLINE_CODE_0__ location it will appear in both the shipping **and** the billing address. It is not possible to have the field in only one of the addresses.
4549b3cda04162be19551f1d924016ba3c81b59d.translated: フィールドが__INLINE_CODE_0__に登録されている場合、配送先住所と請求先住所の両方に表示されます。どちらか一方の住所にのみフィールドを登録することはできません。

metadata.original: If a field is registered in the __INLINE_CODE_0__ location it will appear in both the shipping **and** the billing address. It is not possible to have the field in only one of the addresses.

47582e8ddd13c9030b7d2db293cf7f56f33fd549.original: You will also end up collecting two values for this field, one for shipping and one for billing.
47582e8ddd13c9030b7d2db293cf7f56f33fd549.translated: また、このフィールドには出荷用と請求用の2つの値を収集することになります。

metadata.original: You will also end up collecting two values for this field, one for shipping and one for billing.
### Order information

c9c7f743c11af940296617cdd1dc0143c4dfdef7.original: As part of the additional checkout fields feature, the checkout block has a new inner block called the "Order information block".
c9c7f743c11af940296617cdd1dc0143c4dfdef7.translated: 追加チェックアウトフィールド機能の一環として、チェックアウトブロックに「注文情報ブロック」と呼ばれる新しいインナーブロックが追加されました。

metadata.original: As part of the additional checkout fields feature, the checkout block has a new inner block called the "Order information block".

3ea6be68344e71352294817a31bf665a183e329f.original: This block is used to render fields that aren't part of the contact information or address information, for example it may be a "How did you hear about us" field or a "Gift message" field.
3ea6be68344e71352294817a31bf665a183e329f.translated: このブロックは、連絡先情報や住所情報の一部ではないフィールドをレンダリングするために使用されます。例えば、「どのようにして当サイトをお知りになりましたか」フィールドや「ギフトメッセージ」フィールドなどです。

metadata.original: This block is used to render fields that aren't part of the contact information or address information, for example it may be a "How did you hear about us" field or a "Gift message" field.

8df02333bffc970f4c4ff7f9723cdf1084b703f1.original: Fields rendered here will be saved to the order. They will not be part of the customer's saved address or account information. New orders will not have any previously used values pre-filled.
8df02333bffc970f4c4ff7f9723cdf1084b703f1.translated: ここでレンダリングされたフィールドは注文に保存されます。これらは顧客の保存された住所やアカウント情報の一部にはなりません。新しい注文には、以前に使用された値は入力されません。

metadata.original: Fields rendered here will be saved to the order. They will not be part of the customer's saved address or account information. New orders will not have any previously used values pre-filled.

8076831b17b672d87a7f63af3dd9344a02b8cf11.original: By default, this block will render as the last step in the Checkout form, however it can be moved using the Gutenberg block controls in the editor.
8076831b17b672d87a7f63af3dd9344a02b8cf11.translated: デフォルトでは、このブロックはチェックアウトフォームの最後のステップとしてレンダリングされますが、エディタのGutenbergブロックコントロールを使って移動させることができます。

metadata.original: By default, this block will render as the last step in the Checkout form, however it can be moved using the Gutenberg block controls in the editor.
## Accessing values

96764ee47f7032884cc2fa148cecf9bb0f8c45bd.original: Additional fields are saved to individual meta keys in both the customer meta and order meta, you can access them using helper methods, or using the meta keys directly, we recommend using the helper methods, as they're less likely to change, can handle future migrations, and will support future enhancements (e.g. reading from different locations).
96764ee47f7032884cc2fa148cecf9bb0f8c45bd.translated: 追加フィールドは、顧客メタと注文メタの両方で個別のメタキーに保存されます。ヘルパーメソッドを使うか、メタキーを直接使ってアクセスすることができます。

metadata.original: Additional fields are saved to individual meta keys in both the customer meta and order meta, you can access them using helper methods, or using the meta keys directly, we recommend using the helper methods, as they're less likely to change, can handle future migrations, and will support future enhancements (e.g. reading from different locations).

After an order is placed, the data saved to the customer and the data saved to the order will be the same. Customers can change the values for _future_ orders, or from within their My Account page. If you're looking at a customer value at a specific point in time (i.e. when the order was placed), access it from the order object, if you're looking for the most up to date value regardless, access it from the customer object.

#### Guest customers

When a guest customer places an order with additional fields, those fields will be saved to its session, so as long as the customer still has a valid session going, the values will always be there.

#### Logged-in customers

For logged-in customers, the value is only persisted once they place an order. Accessing a logged-in customer object during the place order lifecycle will return null or stale data.

If you're at a place order hook, doing this will return previous data (not the currently inserted one):

## Validation and sanitization

It is possible to add custom validation and sanitization for additional checkout fields using WordPress action hooks.

These actions happen in two places:

1. Updating and submitting the form during the checkout process and,
2. Updating address/contact information in the "My account" area.

### Sanitization

Sanitization is used to ensure the value of a field is in a specific format. An example is when taking a government ID, you may want to format it so that all letters are capitalized and there are no spaces. At this point, the value should **not** be checked for _validity_. That will come later. This step is only intended to set the field up for validation.

#### Using the `

` filter

To run a custom sanitization function for a field you can use the `

## Conditional visibility and validation via JSON Schema

The `

` of [JSON Schema](https://json-schema.org/understanding-json-schema/about) to create conditional logic for fields. This allows you to dynamically control field visibility, requirement status, and validation rules based on the values of other fields.

Schema is evaluated in the frontend in real-time, and on the backend at any update. This ensures fast and responsive UI, and consistent results between the client and server.

### JSON Schema Structure

Each schema in the array should be a valid JSON Schema object that defines conditions for when the property should be applied. The schema is evaluated against the current cart and checkout state, which includes all field values and various options (payment, shipping, customer).

Basic structure of a JSON Schema object:

__CODE_BLOCK_19__

If you're not familiar with JSON Schema, you can get a quick introduction to it [from the official website](https://json-schema.org/understanding-json-schema/basics), or from one of the libraries used [like AJV](https://ajv.js.org/json-schema.html) or [OPIS.](https://opis.io/json-schema/2.x/examples.html) Checkout builds an abstraction on top of both of them.

### Document object

When you're writing your rules, you're writing a partial schema for the document object, essentially describing the ideal state you want for your field to be required or hidden. 

**Important:** All properties in the document object use snake_case naming convention (e.g., `

`), not camelCase.

An example of the document object looks like this:

#### Validation schema example

Validation is slightly different from conditional visibility and requirement. In validation, you will pass in a subset of schema (only applicable to your field), and its role is to validate the field and show any errors if there.

In this example, we ensure that VAT is made up of a country code and 8-12 numbers.

In the example above, we used [format keyword](https://github.com/ajv-validator/ajv-formats) and `
` to refer to the current field value via [JSON pointers](https://ajv.js.org/guide/combining-schemas.html#data-reference). We also used the `

#### `

` keyword is a way in JSON schema to reference another field's value. In the above example, we use it to refer to the billing email via [JSON pointers](https://ajv.js.org/guide/combining-schemas.html#data-reference).

When dealing with JSON pointers, there are some things to keep in mind:

- The forward slash `
` is used to navigate through the JSON object, so for additional fields, a field named `
` will need to be referenced as `

`.
- Navigation in JSON pointers can be from the current field backward, or from the root. If you have an address field and want to validate say the phone field, this means you will validate 2 values, one for shipping, and one for billing, so you can reference the phone field in 2 ways:
    - `

` group, which will change depending if the billing or shipping value is being validated.
    - `
` which uses relative pointers to step back, in this case, it will access its sibling field, the `
` field. Increase the number to step back even further, for example, `

` will access the customer ID.

### Keywords and values that are not in spec

We support [JSON Schema Draft-07](https://json-schema.org/draft-07), which is simple and doesn't support all the keywords and values that are in the latest spec, but we feel like it covers most of the use cases. On top of that, we introduced some non-standard keywords and values that are not in the spec, their implementation might be different between Opis and AJV (or any future implementation), this is the list of such keywords and values:

- `
`: Custom error message for validation, in AJV, this is `
` and maps that internally for Opis. We also don't support templates in `

`: Refers to the current field value via [JSON pointers](https://ajv.js.org/guide/combining-schemas.html#data-reference), both Opis and AJV use the same implementation.


### Evaluation Logic

- For `

`: If any schema in the array matches the current checkout state, the field will be required.
- For `

`: If any schema in the array matches the current checkout state, the field will be hidden.
- For `

`: The value of the field will be evaluated against the partial schema provided and an error will be shown if it didn't match.

### Performance Considerations

Complex JSON Schema conditions can impact checkout performance. Keep your schemas as simple as possible and limit the number of conditions to what's necessary for your use case.

# Frequently Asked Questions

33a07c31ebd5e6f15d55510d648004a14798159f.original: This document aims to answer some of the frequently asked questions we see from developers extending WooCommerce Blocks.
33a07c31ebd5e6f15d55510d648004a14798159f.translated: このドキュメントは、WooCommerce Blocksを拡張する開発者からよく寄せられる質問にお答えすることを目的としています。

metadata.original: This document aims to answer some of the frequently asked questions we see from developers extending WooCommerce Blocks.

0b7fd8feca06a91097185cd8bb31102ea210b37c.original: We will add to the FAQ document as we receive questions, this isn't the document's final form.
0b7fd8feca06a91097185cd8bb31102ea210b37c.translated: FAQは質問を受け次第、追加していく予定です。

metadata.original: We will add to the FAQ document as we receive questions, this isn't the document's final form.

99a74bcc1c21e8f2522ed39c5d1ac15b0f0223ed.original: If you have questions that aren't addressed here, we invite you to ask them on [GitHub Discussions](__URL_0__) or in the [WooCommerce Community Slack](__URL_1__)
99a74bcc1c21e8f2522ed39c5d1ac15b0f0223ed.translated: ここにない質問は、[GitHub [Discussions](__URL_0__) または [WooCommerce [Community Slack](__URL_1__) でお尋ねください。

metadata.original: If you have questions that aren't addressed here, we invite you to ask them on [GitHub Discussions](__URL_0__) or in the [WooCommerce Community Slack](__URL_1__)
## General questions

cebcb71a6e9ad1efa657256f9ecf632a9550fda9.original: ### How do I react to changes to the Cart or Checkout e.g. shipping method selection, or address changes?
cebcb71a6e9ad1efa657256f9ecf632a9550fda9.translated: ### カートやチェックアウトの変更（配送方法の選択、住所の変更など）にはどのように対応すればよいですか？

metadata.original: ### How do I react to changes to the Cart or Checkout e.g. shipping method selection, or address changes?

1c75d0969a220472331a639171dd997d6069450f.original: The Cart and Checkout blocks read all their data from [__INLINE_CODE_0__ data stores](__URL_0__). We also have [documentation for the data stores WooCommerce Blocks uses](__URL_1__).
1c75d0969a220472331a639171dd997d6069450f.translated: カートブロックとチェックアウトブロックはすべてのデータを[__INLINE_CODE_0__データストア](__URL_0__)から読み込みます。また、[WooCommerceブロックが使用するデータストアのドキュメント](__URL_1__)もあります。

metadata.original: The Cart and Checkout blocks read all their data from [__INLINE_CODE_0__ data stores](__URL_0__). We also have [documentation for the data stores WooCommerce Blocks uses](__URL_1__).

634e79e16a9ea70f0f37298527687746200ec1f4.original: It is common for developers to want to react to changes in the cart or checkout. For example, if a user changes their shipping method, or changes a line of their address.
634e79e16a9ea70f0f37298527687746200ec1f4.translated: 開発者は、カートやチェックアウトの変更に反応したいと思うのが普通です。例えば、ユーザーが配送方法を変更した場合や、住所の行を変更した場合などです。

metadata.original: It is common for developers to want to react to changes in the cart or checkout. For example, if a user changes their shipping method, or changes a line of their address.

231b32e8c5fb4ce35aa91eb3d163c9021617031f.original: There are two ways to do this, depending on how your code is running.
231b32e8c5fb4ce35aa91eb3d163c9021617031f.translated: これを行うには、コードの実行方法に応じて2つの方法がある。

metadata.original: There are two ways to do this, depending on how your code is running.

83c427ff3ceae50b7fbaca86a84e7c16fe1931b0.original: #### If your code is running in a React component
83c427ff3ceae50b7fbaca86a84e7c16fe1931b0.translated: #### コードがReactコンポーネントで実行されている場合

metadata.original: #### If your code is running in a React component

4d2020e41f52cbd2ba819d0843e068d8114a5ea1.original: If your component is an inner block of the Cart/Checkout, or rendered in a [Slot/Fill](/docs/block-development/reference/slot-fills/), you can directly select the data you need from the relevant data store and perform any necessary actions when the data changes. For more information on available selectors, refer to the [documentation for the relevant data store](__URL_0__).
4d2020e41f52cbd2ba819d0843e068d8114a5ea1.translated: コンポーネントがカート/チェックアウトのインナーブロックである場合、または[スロット/フィル](/docs/block-development/reference/slot-fills/)でレンダリングされる場合、関連するデータストアから必要なデータを直接選択し、データが変更されたときに必要なアクションを実行できます。利用可能なセレクタの詳細については、[関連するデータストアのドキュメント](__URL_0__)を参照してください。

metadata.original: If your component is an inner block of the Cart/Checkout, or rendered in a [Slot/Fill](/docs/block-development/reference/slot-fills/), you can directly select the data you need from the relevant data store and perform any necessary actions when the data changes. For more information on available selectors, refer to the [documentation for the relevant data store](__URL_0__).

bc0a57f27546d60ad4ac950f7e9c4f1f59ac97ca.original: #### If your code is running in a non-React context
bc0a57f27546d60ad4ac950f7e9c4f1f59ac97ca.translated: #### コードが非反応コンテキストで実行されている場合

metadata.original: #### If your code is running in a non-React context

9684d782dd8111822a9ba6e5db76ed598e2a4eef.original: This would be true if you're not rendering a block, or running any React code. This means you won't have access to React hooks or custom hooks like __INLINE_CODE_0__. In this case you'd need to use the non-hook alternative to __INLINE_CODE_1__ which is __INLINE_CODE_2__. Given the requirement to react to changes, simply calling __INLINE_CODE_3__ will not be enough as this will only run once. You'll need to use the __INLINE_CODE_4__ method to subscribe to changes to the data you're interested in.
9684d782dd8111822a9ba6e5db76ed598e2a4eef.translated: これは、ブロックをレンダリングしていない場合や、Reactコードを実行していない場合に当てはまります。つまり、Reactフックや__INLINE_CODE_0__のようなカスタムフックにアクセスできない。この場合、__INLINE_CODE_1__に代わる非フックの__INLINE_CODE_2__を使用する必要があります。変更に反応する必要があるため、__INLINE_CODE_3__を呼び出すだけでは十分ではありません。__INLINE_CODE_4__メソッドを使用して、興味のあるデータの変更を購読する必要があります。

metadata.original: This would be true if you're not rendering a block, or running any React code. This means you won't have access to React hooks or custom hooks like __INLINE_CODE_0__. In this case you'd need to use the non-hook alternative to __INLINE_CODE_1__ which is __INLINE_CODE_2__. Given the requirement to react to changes, simply calling __INLINE_CODE_3__ will not be enough as this will only run once. You'll need to use the __INLINE_CODE_4__ method to subscribe to changes to the data you're interested in.

a7545aacbee76b3273f3b9cadc829715a234c1d5.original: Since the __INLINE_CODE_0__ callback would run every time the data store receives an action, you'll need to use caching to avoid doing work when it isn't required. For example, if you only want to do work when the country changes, you would need to cache the previous value and compare it to the current value before running the task.
a7545aacbee76b3273f3b9cadc829715a234c1d5.translated: __INLINE_CODE_0__コールバックは、データストアがアクションを受け取るたびに実行されるので、キャッシュを使用して、不要なときに処理を行わないようにする必要があります。例えば、国が変わったときだけ処理を行いたいのであれば、タスクを実行する前に以前の値をキャッシュし、現在の値と比較する必要があります。

metadata.original: Since the __INLINE_CODE_0__ callback would run every time the data store receives an action, you'll need to use caching to avoid doing work when it isn't required. For example, if you only want to do work when the country changes, you would need to cache the previous value and compare it to the current value before running the task.

ebbbe63d908f059065485b685ddf0da526a8bb30.original: If you no longer need to react to changes, you can unsubscribe from the data store using the __INLINE_CODE_0__ method which is returned by the __INLINE_CODE_1__ method, like in the example above.
ebbbe63d908f059065485b685ddf0da526a8bb30.translated: 変更に反応する必要がなくなった場合は、上の例のように、__INLINE_CODE_1__メソッドから返される__INLINE_CODE_0__メソッドを使用して、データストアからの登録を解除することができる。

metadata.original: If you no longer need to react to changes, you can unsubscribe from the data store using the __INLINE_CODE_0__ method which is returned by the __INLINE_CODE_1__ method, like in the example above.
## Cart modifications

d034a3877d9e86db98c16101e2990f86078d784e.original: ### How do I dynamically make changes to the cart from the client?
d034a3877d9e86db98c16101e2990f86078d784e.translated: ### クライアントからカートに動的に変更を加えるには？

2528f88841dca694d09a378e14c2e86d5bd6e853.original: To perform actions on the server based on a client-side action, you'll need to use [__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__)

c7fc854cf46570dd2677a85e39976b2ba4db5f66.original: As an example, to add a "Get 10% off if you sign up to the mailing list" checkbox on your site you can use __INLINE_CODE_0__ to automatically apply a 10% coupon to the cart.
c7fc854cf46570dd2677a85e39976b2ba4db5f66.translated: 例として、あなたのサイトに「メーリングリストに登録すると10%オフ」チェックボックスを追加するには、__INLINE_CODE_0__を使用して、自動的に10%クーポンをカートに適用することができます。

e080dd4441211fa257c7b1cd6b587cb02fa469b4.original: Assuming you've already added the checkbox, either through the Additional Checkout Fields API, or by creating an inner block, the next step will be to register the server-side code to apply the coupon if the box is checked, and remove it if it's not.
e080dd4441211fa257c7b1cd6b587cb02fa469b4.translated: Additional Checkout Fields APIを通じて、またはインナーブロックを作成することによって、チェックボックスをすでに追加したと仮定すると、次のステップは、チェックボックスがチェックされている場合はクーポンを適用し、チェックされていない場合はクーポンを削除するサーバー側のコードを登録することです。

metadata.original: Assuming you've already added the checkbox, either through the Additional Checkout Fields API, or by creating an inner block, the next step will be to register the server-side code to apply the coupon if the box is checked, and remove it if it's not.

33ef58114f17733629ea53ccd1822bcdab9bffad.translated: ### カートの各アイテムに何かをレンダリングするには？

metadata.original: ### How do I render something in each cart item?

90211b01a0933713005275a6b0df8682a057b3cb.original: This is currently **not** officially supported, however we have heard of developers doing this using DOM manipulation and React portals. If you choose to take this route, please note that your integrations may stop working if we make changes to the Cart block in the future.
90211b01a0933713005275a6b0df8682a057b3cb.translated: この方法は現在 ** 公式にはサポートされていませんが、DOM 操作や React ポータルを使用してこの方法を実行している開発者の話を聞いたことがあります。この方法を選択した場合、将来 Cart ブロックが変更されたときに、統合が機能しなくなる可能性があることに注意してください。

metadata.original: This is currently **not** officially supported, however we have heard of developers doing this using DOM manipulation and React portals. If you choose to take this route, please note that your integrations may stop working if we make changes to the Cart block in the future.
## Checkout modifications

8de451fc553b9243890659d94a22bfb552234ac2.original: ### How do I remove checkout fields?
8de451fc553b9243890659d94a22bfb552234ac2.translated: ### チェックアウトフィールドを削除するには？

metadata.original: ### How do I remove checkout fields?

9f08e3d9da66e742c964c31788605b47f90c284a.original: We don't encourage this due to the wide array of plugins WordPress and Woo support. Some of these may rely on certain checkout fields to function, but if you're certain the fields are safe to remove, please see [Removing Checkout Fields](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/removing-checkout-fields/).
9f08e3d9da66e742c964c31788605b47f90c284a.translated: WordPressとWooは様々なプラグインをサポートしているため、私たちはこれを推奨していません。これらの中にはチェックアウトフィールドに依存して機能するものもありますが、そのフィールドを削除しても問題ない場合は、[チェックアウトフィールドの削除](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/removing-checkout-fields/) をご覧ください。

metadata.original: We don't encourage this due to the wide array of plugins WordPress and Woo support. Some of these may rely on certain checkout fields to function, but if you're certain the fields are safe to remove, please see [Removing Checkout Fields](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/removing-checkout-fields/).

bd0f27dc8482ef54f72eb8268851dbb959a2e702.original: ### How do I modify the order or customer data during checkout?
bd0f27dc8482ef54f72eb8268851dbb959a2e702.translated: ### チェックアウト時に注文や顧客データを変更するにはどうすればよいですか？

metadata.original: ### How do I modify the order or customer data during checkout?

cdbee54a369d7183800678d6b2ebaf7628fa7b1f.original: If you want to modify order or customer data submitted during checkout you can use the __INLINE_CODE_0__ action.
cdbee54a369d7183800678d6b2ebaf7628fa7b1f.translated: チェックアウト時に送信された注文データや顧客データを修正したい場合は、__INLINE_CODE_0__アクションを使用することができます。

metadata.original: If you want to modify order or customer data submitted during checkout you can use the __INLINE_CODE_0__ action.

6579122286a0329a267276a56c835c7bc6ea2455.original: This action fires just before payment is processed. At this point you can modify the order as you would at any other point in the WooCommerce lifecycle, you still have to call __INLINE_CODE_0__ to persist the changes.
6579122286a0329a267276a56c835c7bc6ea2455.translated: このアクションは支払いが処理される直前に実行されます。この時点で、WooCommerceのライフサイクルの他の時点と同じように注文を変更することができますが、変更を永続化するために__INLINE_CODE_0__を呼び出す必要があります。

metadata.original: This action fires just before payment is processed. At this point you can modify the order as you would at any other point in the WooCommerce lifecycle, you still have to call __INLINE_CODE_0__ to persist the changes.

metadata.original: As an example, let's make sure the user's first and last names are capitalized:

d1b7d638cf6393eb1fc22352313d30fecc173771.original: ### How do I render something in the Checkout block?

metadata.original: ### How do I render something in the Checkout block?

cb706c7da123034dc37372506992b9d9fb16af5f.original: This depends on what you want to render.
cb706c7da123034dc37372506992b9d9fb16af5f.translated: これは何をレンダリングしたいかによる。

metadata.original: This depends on what you want to render.

914f1c130e905982403bb32fae544b752938b911.translated: #### フィールドのレンダリング

metadata.original: #### Rendering a field

76449b7908f82554b06abb4055510c2ed0bb9dc3.original: The recommended approach to rendering fields in the Checkout block is to use the [Additional Checkout Fields API](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/additional-checkout-fields/).
76449b7908f82554b06abb4055510c2ed0bb9dc3.translated: チェックアウト・ブロックのフィールドをレンダリングするための推奨アプローチは、[Additional Checkout Fields API](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/additional-checkout-fields/)を使用することです。

metadata.original: The recommended approach to rendering fields in the Checkout block is to use the [Additional Checkout Fields API](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/additional-checkout-fields/).

501831522c851ab4d7e30b4ec6a3fe64fb421220.translated: #### カスタムブロックのレンダリング

metadata.original: #### Rendering a custom block

4c975fe0b59a3398c8e0fff65d815fc102dfa4ab.original: To render a custom block in the Checkout block, the recommended approach is to create a child block of one of the existing Checkout inner blocks. We have an example template that can be used to set up and study an inner block. To install and use it, follow the instructions in [__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__). Please note that this example contains multiple other examples of extensibility, not just inner blocks.
4c975fe0b59a3398c8e0fff65d815fc102dfa4ab.translated: チェックアウト・ブロックにカスタム・ブロックをレンダリングするには、既存のチェックアウト・インナー・ブロックの1つの子ブロックを作成することをお勧めします。インナー・ブロックの設定と研究に使用できるテンプレートの例があります。これをインストールして使用するには、[__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__)の指示に従ってください。この例には、インナー・ブロックだけでなく、他にも複数の拡張性の例が含まれていることに注意してください。

metadata.original: To render a custom block in the Checkout block, the recommended approach is to create a child block of one of the existing Checkout inner blocks. We have an example template that can be used to set up and study an inner block. To install and use it, follow the instructions in [__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__). Please note that this example contains multiple other examples of extensibility, not just inner blocks.
# Blocks reference

0bed0d9674016df5f9ea49ddd6aaf41ca7608092.translated: このページはパッケージに含まれるWooブロックの一覧です。(まだblock.json定義を使っていないブロックがあるので、不完全です）。

f6ff4006b264a2118fbffe4b858d75590552e7d3.translated: # スクリプト、スタイル、データを扱う

metadata.original: # Handling scripts, styles, and data
## The problem

e5f3ea853d47762a52baeaccbfc5046693a9dc1c.original: You are an extension developer, and to allow users to interact with your extension on the client-side, you have written some CSS and JavaScript that you would like to be included on the page. Your JavaScript also relies on some server-side data, and you'd like this to be available to your scripts.
e5f3ea853d47762a52baeaccbfc5046693a9dc1c.translated: あなたはエクステンションの開発者で、ユーザーがクライアントサイドでエクステンションとやりとりできるようにするために、CSS と JavaScript を書きました。JavaScriptはサーバーサイドのデータにも依存しており、スクリプトでこれを利用できるようにしたいと考えています。

metadata.original: You are an extension developer, and to allow users to interact with your extension on the client-side, you have written some CSS and JavaScript that you would like to be included on the page. Your JavaScript also relies on some server-side data, and you'd like this to be available to your scripts.
## The solution

5129d68c75c1b3c83d402b1139ae738ac47cd7bc.original: You may use the __INLINE_CODE_0__ to register an __INLINE_CODE_1__ this will be a class that will handle the enqueuing of scripts, styles, and data. You may have a different __INLINE_CODE_2__ for each block (Mini-Cart, Cart and Checkout), or you may use the same one, it is entirely dependent on your use case.
5129d68c75c1b3c83d402b1139ae738ac47cd7bc.translated: __INLINE_CODE_0__を使用して__INLINE_CODE_1__を登録することができ、これはスクリプト、スタイル、データのエンキューを処理するクラスになります。各ブロック (ミニカート、カート、チェックアウト) に異なる __INLINE_CODE_2__ を使用することもできますし、同じものを使用することもできます。

metadata.original: You may use the __INLINE_CODE_0__ to register an __INLINE_CODE_1__ this will be a class that will handle the enqueuing of scripts, styles, and data. You may have a different __INLINE_CODE_2__ for each block (Mini-Cart, Cart and Checkout), or you may use the same one, it is entirely dependent on your use case.

63e92764d98add5e27b96c100a9b0a90f6bef721.original: You should use the hooks: __INLINE_CODE_0__. __INLINE_CODE_1__ and __INLINE_CODE_2__. These hooks pass an instance of [__INLINE_CODE_3__](__URL_0__) to the callback.
63e92764d98add5e27b96c100a9b0a90f6bef721.translated: フックを使うべきである：__INLINE_CODE_0__。__INLINE_CODE_1__と__INLINE_CODE_2__です。これらのフックは[__INLINE_CODE_3__](__URL_0__)のインスタンスをコールバックに渡します。

metadata.original: You should use the hooks: __INLINE_CODE_0__. __INLINE_CODE_1__ and __INLINE_CODE_2__. These hooks pass an instance of [__INLINE_CODE_3__](__URL_0__) to the callback.

64935dfbda937804e7d801672859a5f526747131.original: You may then use the __INLINE_CODE_0__ method on this object to register your __INLINE_CODE_1__.
64935dfbda937804e7d801672859a5f526747131.translated: このオブジェクトの__INLINE_CODE_0__メソッドを使用して、__INLINE_CODE_1__を登録することができます。

metadata.original: You may then use the __INLINE_CODE_0__ method on this object to register your __INLINE_CODE_1__.
## __INLINE_CODE_0__ methods

69717493498aba01d80be353080583e54539bf4c.original: To begin, we'll need to create our integration class, our __INLINE_CODE_0__. This will be a class that implements WooCommerce Blocks' interface named [__INLINE_CODE_1__](__URL_0__).
69717493498aba01d80be353080583e54539bf4c.translated: はじめに、統合クラスである __INLINE_CODE_0__ を作成する必要があります。これは[__INLINE_CODE_1__](__URL_0__)というWooCommerce Blocksのインターフェイスを実装したクラスになります。

metadata.original: To begin, we'll need to create our integration class, our __INLINE_CODE_0__. This will be a class that implements WooCommerce Blocks' interface named [__INLINE_CODE_1__](__URL_0__).

d79637d543ba4fe259091222195fe958c42a1cf7.original: In this section, we will step through the interface's members and discuss what they are used for.
d79637d543ba4fe259091222195fe958c42a1cf7.translated: このセクションでは、インターフェイスのメンバーを順を追って見ていき、それらが何に使われるのかを説明する。

metadata.original: In this section, we will step through the interface's members and discuss what they are used for.
### __INLINE_CODE_0__

9a49446c34549e39bb785182068888388ededdd1.original: This is the __INLINE_CODE_0__'s way of namespacing your integration. The name chosen here should be unique to your extension. This method should return a string.
9a49446c34549e39bb785182068888388ededdd1.translated: これは、__INLINE_CODE_0__があなたの統合を名前空間化する方法です。ここで指定する名前は、拡張モジュール固有のものでなければなりません。このメソッドは文字列を返します。

metadata.original: This is the __INLINE_CODE_0__'s way of namespacing your integration. The name chosen here should be unique to your extension. This method should return a string.

a334a68212ff56067ad167d0049833de14d57d2a.original: This is where any setup, or initialization for your integration should be placed. For example, you could register the scripts and styles your extension needs here. This method should not return anything.
a334a68212ff56067ad167d0049833de14d57d2a.translated: ここには、統合のためのセットアップや初期設定を置く必要があります。たとえば、拡張モジュールに必要なスクリプトやスタイルをここに登録することができます。このメソッドは何も返してはいけません。

metadata.original: This is where any setup, or initialization for your integration should be placed. For example, you could register the scripts and styles your extension needs here. This method should not return anything.

2bbb0c819c19e5c9375ccbcef2e0d78f51ce96b5.original: This is where the handles of any scripts you want to be enqueued on the client-side in the frontend context should be placed. This method should return an array of strings.
2bbb0c819c19e5c9375ccbcef2e0d78f51ce96b5.translated: フロントエンドコンテキストのクライアント側でエンキューさせたいスクリプトのハンドルをここに置きます。このメソッドは文字列の配列を返します。

metadata.original: This is where the handles of any scripts you want to be enqueued on the client-side in the frontend context should be placed. This method should return an array of strings.

f36f1bfef0a79f6fcedf1c861b7e70f8065888e6.original: This is where the handles of any scripts you want to be enqueued on the client-side in the editor context should be placed. This method should return an array of strings.
f36f1bfef0a79f6fcedf1c861b7e70f8065888e6.translated: エディタコンテキストのクライアントサイドでエンキューさせたいスクリプトのハンドルが置かれる場所です。このメソッドは文字列の配列を返す必要があります。

metadata.original: This is where the handles of any scripts you want to be enqueued on the client-side in the editor context should be placed. This method should return an array of strings.

202e5efcd84d3e7af56eee0059b99be2565073c2.original: This is where you can set values you want to be available to your scripts on the frontend. This method should return an associative array, the keys of which will be used to get the data using the JavaScript function __INLINE_CODE_0__.
202e5efcd84d3e7af56eee0059b99be2565073c2.translated: ここで、フロントエンドのスクリプトで使用したい値を設定します。このメソッドは連想配列を返す必要があり、そのキーは JavaScript の関数 __INLINE_CODE_0__ を使用してデータを取得するために使用されます。

metadata.original: This is where you can set values you want to be available to your scripts on the frontend. This method should return an associative array, the keys of which will be used to get the data using the JavaScript function __INLINE_CODE_0__.

e20f39c091de4a9157e38f75eb05a1a700557895.original: The keys and values of this array should all be serializable.
e20f39c091de4a9157e38f75eb05a1a700557895.translated: この配列のキーと値はすべてシリアライズ可能でなければならない。

metadata.original: The keys and values of this array should all be serializable.
## Usage example

ba7c5d13288dbe71fccf0960d4dda763586469c2.original: Let's suppose we're the author of an extension: __INLINE_CODE_0__. We want to enqueue scripts, styles, and data on the frontend when either the Mini-Cart, Cart or Checkout blocks are being used.
ba7c5d13288dbe71fccf0960d4dda763586469c2.translated: 私たちが拡張機能の作者だとしよう：inline_code_0__とします。ミニカート、カート、チェックアウトブロックのいずれかが使用されているときに、フロントエンドでスクリプト、スタイル、データをエンキューしたい。

metadata.original: Let's suppose we're the author of an extension: __INLINE_CODE_0__. We want to enqueue scripts, styles, and data on the frontend when either the Mini-Cart, Cart or Checkout blocks are being used.

aedc760fd01e14b196f1ca8508431066ce67156d.original: We also want some data from a server-side function to be available to our front-end scripts.
aedc760fd01e14b196f1ca8508431066ce67156d.translated: また、サーバーサイドの関数からのデータをフロントエンドのスクリプトで利用できるようにしたい。

metadata.original: We also want some data from a server-side function to be available to our front-end scripts.

1549de5b0569b023d8c241f0314dd495eaf604e4.original: You will notice that in the example below, we reference the __INLINE_CODE_0__ file. This is created by the [__INLINE_CODE_1__](__URL_0__) which creates a PHP file mapping the dependencies of your client-side scripts, so that they can be added in the __INLINE_CODE_2__ array of __INLINE_CODE_3__.
1549de5b0569b023d8c241f0314dd495eaf604e4.translated: 以下の例では、__INLINE_CODE_0__ ファイルを参照しています。これは[__INLINE_CODE_1__](__URL_0__)によって作成され、クライアント側スクリプトの依存関係をマッピングしたPHPファイルを作成し、__INLINE_CODE_3__の__INLINE_CODE_2__配列に追加できるようにします。

metadata.original: You will notice that in the example below, we reference the __INLINE_CODE_0__ file. This is created by the [__INLINE_CODE_1__](__URL_0__) which creates a PHP file mapping the dependencies of your client-side scripts, so that they can be added in the __INLINE_CODE_2__ array of __INLINE_CODE_3__.
Let's create our __INLINE_CODE_0__.

b2f62d8b9346e1046ab5e78325470427caa4f282.original: As mentioned, we will need register our __INLINE_CODE_0__ with WooCommerce Blocks, as we want our scripts to be included when either the Mini-Cart, Cart or Checkout is used, we need to register callbacks for three actions.
b2f62d8b9346e1046ab5e78325470427caa4f282.translated: 前述の通り、WooCommerce Blocksに__INLINE_CODE_0__を登録する必要があります。ミニカート、カート、チェックアウトのいずれかが使用されたときにスクリプトが含まれるようにしたいので、3つのアクションのコールバックを登録する必要があります。

metadata.original: As mentioned, we will need register our __INLINE_CODE_0__ with WooCommerce Blocks, as we want our scripts to be included when either the Mini-Cart, Cart or Checkout is used, we need to register callbacks for three actions.

3f3d4b14d0d2a7d5606cbe793820e18fce816e10.original: Now, when we load a page containing either block, we should see the scripts we registered in __INLINE_CODE_0__ being loaded!
3f3d4b14d0d2a7d5606cbe793820e18fce816e10.translated: これで、どちらかのブロックを含むページをロードすると、__INLINE_CODE_0__に登録したスクリプトがロードされるはずだ！

metadata.original: Now, when we load a page containing either block, we should see the scripts we registered in __INLINE_CODE_0__ being loaded!

ac966e7ba912334b5d3f3a9c68cccb831834cb77.translated: ### __INLINE_CODE_0__ で追加されたデータの取得

metadata.original: ### Getting data added in __INLINE_CODE_0__

8cbad157628149a923564d5da77e962e3d7e7ade.original: We associated some data with the extension in the __INLINE_CODE_0__ method of our interface, we need to know how to get this!
8cbad157628149a923564d5da77e962e3d7e7ade.translated: インターフェイスの__INLINE_CODE_0__メソッドで、拡張機能にデータを関連付けた！

metadata.original: We associated some data with the extension in the __INLINE_CODE_0__ method of our interface, we need to know how to get this!

12787f9ad1fc17de4c45b541d9d3e9e577ab0762.original: In the __INLINE_CODE_0__ package there is a method you can import called __INLINE_CODE_1__. This method accepts a string. The name of the setting containing the data added in __INLINE_CODE_2__ is the name of your integration (i.e. the value returned by __INLINE_CODE_3__) suffixed with __INLINE_CODE_4__. In our example it would be: __INLINE_CODE_5__.
12787f9ad1fc17de4c45b541d9d3e9e577ab0762.translated: __INLINE_CODE_0__パッケージには、__INLINE_CODE_1__というインポート可能なメソッドがある。このメソッドは文字列を受け取ります。__INLINE_CODE_2__で追加されたデータを含む設定の名前は、__INLINE_CODE_4__でサフィックスされたインテグレーション名（つまり__INLINE_CODE_3__が返す値）になります。この例では__INLINE_CODE_5__です。

metadata.original: In the __INLINE_CODE_0__ package there is a method you can import called __INLINE_CODE_1__. This method accepts a string. The name of the setting containing the data added in __INLINE_CODE_2__ is the name of your integration (i.e. the value returned by __INLINE_CODE_3__) suffixed with __INLINE_CODE_4__. In our example it would be: __INLINE_CODE_5__.

0e5e7350e883e5cc509476d09a9c7d9f184fe90c.original: The value returned here is a plain old JavaScript object, keyed by the keys of the array returned by __INLINE_CODE_0__, the values will serialized.
0e5e7350e883e5cc509476d09a9c7d9f184fe90c.translated: ここで返される値は、__INLINE_CODE_0__で返される配列のキーをキーとした、古いJavaScriptオブジェクトで、値はシリアライズされます。

metadata.original: The value returned here is a plain old JavaScript object, keyed by the keys of the array returned by __INLINE_CODE_0__, the values will serialized.

52c5834ce5d73616c9d635a8c35c80d99afedee8.original: # Overview of data flow between client and server
52c5834ce5d73616c9d635a8c35c80d99afedee8.translated: # クライアントとサーバー間のデータフローの概要

metadata.original: # Overview of data flow between client and server

8f312c4e56d97c7362c9f2ba039d2321469d0455.original: In the WooCommerce Cart and Checkout blocks, the server is the source of truth for critical transactional and persistent data. This includes:
8f312c4e56d97c7362c9f2ba039d2321469d0455.translated: WooCommerceのカートとチェックアウトブロックでは、サーバーは重要なトランザクションと永続的なデータの真実のソースです。これには以下が含まれます：

metadata.original: In the WooCommerce Cart and Checkout blocks, the server is the source of truth for critical transactional and persistent data. This includes:

d2f29a6843ea587579737a1ca5ced6f6516520d5.original:
-   Cart item details (items, quantities, and prices)
-   Cart totals (e.g. taxes, fees, subtotals)
-   Customer information (shipping and billing addresses, other customer data)
    -   Additional fields added using the [Additional Checkout Fields API](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/additional-checkout-fields/) are also persisted server-side.
-   Shipping methods and rates
-   Other cart details, such as applied coupons
d2f29a6843ea587579737a1ca5ced6f6516520d5.translated:
-   カートアイテムの詳細（アイテム、数量、価格）
-   カート合計（税金、手数料、小計など）
-   顧客情報（配送先住所、請求先住所、その他の顧客データ）
    -   Additional Checkout Fields API](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/additional-checkout-fields/)を使用して追加されたフィールドもサーバーサイドに永続化されます。
-   配送方法と料金
-   適用されたクーポンなど、その他のカートの詳細

metadata.original:
-   Cart item details (items, quantities, and prices)
-   Cart totals (e.g. taxes, fees, subtotals)
-   Customer information (shipping and billing addresses, other customer data)
    -   Additional fields added using the [Additional Checkout Fields API](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/additional-checkout-fields/) are also persisted server-side.
-   Shipping methods and rates
-   Other cart details, such as applied coupons

82c17e770d0247f9b92d38ba48384c1f567c84ac.original:
Such data must be persisted server-side to ensure accuracy, consistency, and reliability across different user sessions and devices.
Ephemeral UI state—such as temporary validation states, or UI-specific interactions like expanded/collapsed sections should remain client-side and not be automatically persisted on the server, unless the specific state needs to be maintained across page loads or is critical to the user's checkout process.
82c17e770d0247f9b92d38ba48384c1f567c84ac.translated:
このようなデータは、異なるユーザー・セッションやデバイス間で正確性、一貫性、信頼性を保証するために、サーバー側に永続化されなければなりません。
一時的な検証状態や、展開/折りたたみセクションのようなUI特有のインタラクションのような、一時的なUIの状態は、クライアントサイドのままであるべきで、ページのロードに渡って特定の状態を維持する必要があるか、ユーザーのチェックアウトプロセスにとって重要でない限り、サーバーに自動的に永続化されるべきではありません。

metadata.original:
Such data must be persisted server-side to ensure accuracy, consistency, and reliability across different user sessions and devices.
Ephemeral UI state—such as temporary validation states, or UI-specific interactions like expanded/collapsed sections should remain client-side and not be automatically persisted on the server, unless the specific state needs to be maintained across page loads or is critical to the user's checkout process.

810bc2e77092d56ea5ddd48db711cda4f7c67e9f.original: You may wish to get data from the server into the client, and vice/versa. This document will outline the general concepts and data flow in the Cart/Checkout blocks, and provide links, or guidance on some common use cases.
810bc2e77092d56ea5ddd48db711cda4f7c67e9f.translated: サーバからクライアントにデータを取得したい場合もあれば、その逆もあるでしょう。このドキュメントでは、カート/チェックアウト・ブロックにおける一般的な概念とデータの流れを概説し、一般的な使用例に関するリンクやガイダンスを提供します。

metadata.original: You may wish to get data from the server into the client, and vice/versa. This document will outline the general concepts and data flow in the Cart/Checkout blocks, and provide links, or guidance on some common use cases.

0b12bf35278aae69e44a45689af5eb896d4b0b83.translated: ## データはどこに保存されるのか？

metadata.original: ## Where is data stored?

a46436b444573e5c8443dc1550e63a3044c27cab.original: All the data relating to a cart, customer, and order is stored on the server, either in the database or in the customer's session. When it is sent to the client, it is stored in [__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__) data stores.
a46436b444573e5c8443dc1550e63a3044c27cab.translated: カート、顧客、注文に関連するすべてのデータは、データベースまたは顧客のセッションのいずれかで、サーバーに保存されます。クライアントに送信されると、[__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__)データストアに保存されます。

metadata.original: All the data relating to a cart, customer, and order is stored on the server, either in the database or in the customer's session. When it is sent to the client, it is stored in [__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__) data stores.

21eb9a77ee1ef546e59f2824dbec60114bf737fc.original: ## How do I get my Server-side (PHP) data into the client (JavaScript) and vice/versa
21eb9a77ee1ef546e59f2824dbec60114bf737fc.translated: ## どうすればサーバー側(PHP)のデータをクライアント側(JavaScript)に取り込めますか？

metadata.original: ## How do I get my Server-side (PHP) data into the client (JavaScript) and vice/versa

bd2f4e63043c94a828c13e68432150ef881f1592.original: Since the server is the source of truth, all data from the client should eventually make its way there if it needs to be persisted with the order.
bd2f4e63043c94a828c13e68432150ef881f1592.translated: サーバーは真実の源であるため、クライアントからのすべてのデータは、オーダーとともに永続化される必要がある場合、最終的にサーバーに到達するはずである。

metadata.original: Since the server is the source of truth, all data from the client should eventually make its way there if it needs to be persisted with the order.

8191e58c9116ed707f694926a85073244a093bcd.original: There is also the case that your client needs data that can only be derived server-side, such as configuration options set in the WooCommerce settings dashboard, or data coming from external services (e.g. courier rates or payment APIs).
8191e58c9116ed707f694926a85073244a093bcd.translated: また、WooCommerceの設定ダッシュボードで設定された設定オプションや、外部サービス（宅配便料金や支払いAPIなど）からのデータなど、クライアントがサーバーサイドでしか取得できないデータを必要とする場合もあります。

metadata.original: There is also the case that your client needs data that can only be derived server-side, such as configuration options set in the WooCommerce settings dashboard, or data coming from external services (e.g. courier rates or payment APIs).

810608b36070e96663cf0a8b06f63172fba5b28c.translated: ### サーバー（PHP）からクライアント（JavaScript）へ

metadata.original: ### Server (PHP) to Client (JavaScript)

ed8dfd2b26db8e415bc5647d1b538cf68b609532.original: There are two ways to get your data from the server to the client, depending on whether it is static or dynamic.
ed8dfd2b26db8e415bc5647d1b538cf68b609532.translated: データをサーバーからクライアントに送るには、静的か動的かによって2つの方法がある。

metadata.original: There are two ways to get your data from the server to the client, depending on whether it is static or dynamic.
#### Static data

9bbc8b1c310377e4ef2c5a796f29210ecbf5036b.original: Static data is not likely to change based on actions the shopper takes, for example, an option from the WooCommerce settings dashboard. The recommended way of getting this data to the client is using the __INLINE_CODE_0__.
9bbc8b1c310377e4ef2c5a796f29210ecbf5036b.translated: 静的なデータは、例えばWooCommerceの設定ダッシュボードからのオプションのように、買い物客が取るアクションに基づいて変更される可能性はありません。このデータをクライアントに渡すには、__INLINE_CODE_0__を使用することをお勧めします。

metadata.original: Static data is not likely to change based on actions the shopper takes, for example, an option from the WooCommerce settings dashboard. The recommended way of getting this data to the client is using the __INLINE_CODE_0__.

c04038121659b16f0c411212c48eae308ff29255.original: When data is added here, it is serialized and sent to the client on page load. It will not change based on actions the shopper takes, e.g. adding items to the cart or changing their address.
c04038121659b16f0c411212c48eae308ff29255.translated: ここにデータが追加されると、ページロード時にシリアライズされてクライアントに送信されます。例えば、カートに商品を追加したり、住所を変更したりといった、買い物客のアクションによってデータが変更されることはありません。

metadata.original: When data is added here, it is serialized and sent to the client on page load. It will not change based on actions the shopper takes, e.g. adding items to the cart or changing their address.

fabdfe78c7318cd274ab6cadcf04b5acba22ef11.original: A key/value pair can be added to the registry like so:
fabdfe78c7318cd274ab6cadcf04b5acba22ef11.translated: キーと値のペアは、レジストリに次のように追加できる：

c5d185ae01b9243089c7e1502d18521d40affe7b.original: If a duplicate key exists, it will not be overwritten. Using a unique identifier is important, the recommendation is __INLINE_CODE_0__ to help ensure the key is unique.
c5d185ae01b9243089c7e1502d18521d40affe7b.translated: 重複キーが存在する場合、上書きはされない。一意な識別子を使用することは重要であり、推奨は __INLINE_CODE_0__ である。

d6c83e0b9c2577d537b5b5295558d03af0151975.translated: クライアントでこのデータを取得するには、__INLINE_CODE_0__を次のように使う：

metadata.original: To get this data on the client, use __INLINE_CODE_0__ like so:
#### Dynamic data

a200f3519f5134ad8edc9a62c6393831a3adc187.original: Dynamic data is data that is likely to change in response to the shopper's actions, for example, changing location, or items in the cart. In this case, you need to add this to the cart API response. The cart response is sent on many routes during the shopper's journey, and on almost every API response triggered by the Cart/Checkout blocks.
a200f3519f5134ad8edc9a62c6393831a3adc187.translated: 動的データとは、買い物客の行動に応じて変化する可能性のあるデータのことで、例えば、場所やカート内のアイテムの変更などです。この場合、カートAPIのレスポンスにこれを追加する必要がある。カートレスポンスは、買い物客の移動中に多くのルートで送信され、カート/チェックアウトブロックによってトリガーされるほとんどすべてのAPIレスポンスで送信されます。

metadata.original: Dynamic data is data that is likely to change in response to the shopper's actions, for example, changing location, or items in the cart. In this case, you need to add this to the cart API response. The cart response is sent on many routes during the shopper's journey, and on almost every API response triggered by the Cart/Checkout blocks.

886041663f0d2a49c17ad13693ec5a25272a3b67.original: To add data here, you'll need to extend the API response. See [Exposing your data in the Store API](__URL_0__).
886041663f0d2a49c17ad13693ec5a25272a3b67.translated: ここにデータを追加するには、APIレスポンスを拡張する必要があります。ストアAPIでデータを公開する](__URL_0__)を参照してください。

metadata.original: To add data here, you'll need to extend the API response. See [Exposing your data in the Store API](__URL_0__).

b76f4d8af710d719408c773e61b5a0d148e8a736.translated: ### クライアント(JavaScript)からサーバー(PHP)へ

metadata.original: ### Client (JavaScript) to Server (PHP)

db81675807dc6c8ec3c497145472aa4176ba9b92.original: Getting data from the client to the server can be done in three different ways:
db81675807dc6c8ec3c497145472aa4176ba9b92.translated: クライアントからサーバーへのデータ取得は、3つの異なる方法で行うことができる：

metadata.original: Getting data from the client to the server can be done in three different ways:

0519ce2d1840873eb91ca121d2fd91d080347c00.translated: #### チェックアウトフィールドの更新

metadata.original: #### Checkout field updates

24e453307021718621ee8d6b0c78ab0b7d60fd3c.original: When the shopper updates a checkout field, the data is sent to the server immediately. For Additional Fields, this is sent via a PUT request to the __INLINE_CODE_0__ endpoint. For address fields, this is sent via a POST request to the __INLINE_CODE_1__ endpoint (via batch). Both will return an updated cart, which is then applied to the client and totals are updated.
24e453307021718621ee8d6b0c78ab0b7d60fd3c.translated: ショッパーがチェックアウトフィールドを更新すると、データは即座にサーバに送信されます。追加フィールドの場合、__INLINE_CODE_0__エンドポイントへのPUTリクエストで送信されます。アドレスフィールドの場合は、__INLINE_CODE_1__エンドポイントへのPOSTリクエストで送信されます（バッチ処理）。どちらも更新されたカートを返し、それがクライアントに適用され、合計が更新されます。

metadata.original: When the shopper updates a checkout field, the data is sent to the server immediately. For Additional Fields, this is sent via a PUT request to the __INLINE_CODE_0__ endpoint. For address fields, this is sent via a POST request to the __INLINE_CODE_1__ endpoint (via batch). Both will return an updated cart, which is then applied to the client and totals are updated.

b6d341df868b064bea815ae3dc28ee0eb7926d7d.original: #### Piggybacking on a Store API request
b6d341df868b064bea815ae3dc28ee0eb7926d7d.translated: #### 店舗APIリクエストのピギーバック

metadata.original: #### Piggybacking on a Store API request

cbba65d22ba859a91bc651f4bf6530c188a9d0aa.original: This is useful for things that don't require an immediate response from the server, for example if you've added a new block to the Checkout and it contains a form field that should be saved along with the order. If this form field just needs to be saved and doesn't need to update any other values in the cart, then the data should be sent with the checkout request. The [Add a new inner block containing a custom field to the WooCommerce Checkout Block](__URL_0__) documentation provides a worked example of using __INLINE_CODE_0__ along with extending the Store API to receive your data in an existing request.
cbba65d22ba859a91bc651f4bf6530c188a9d0aa.translated: 例えば、チェックアウトに新しいブロックを追加し、その中に注文と一緒に保存されるべきフォームフィールドが含まれている場合などです。このフォームフィールドが保存されるだけで、カートの他の値を更新する必要がない場合、データはチェックアウトリクエストと一緒に送信されるべきです。Add [a new inner block containing a custom field to the WooCommerce Checkout Block](__URL_0__)のドキュメントでは、__INLINE_CODE_0__の使用例と、既存のリクエストでデータを受け取るためのStore APIの拡張について説明しています。

metadata.original: This is useful for things that don't require an immediate response from the server, for example if you've added a new block to the Checkout and it contains a form field that should be saved along with the order. If this form field just needs to be saved and doesn't need to update any other values in the cart, then the data should be sent with the checkout request. The [Add a new inner block containing a custom field to the WooCommerce Checkout Block](__URL_0__) documentation provides a worked example of using __INLINE_CODE_0__ along with extending the Store API to receive your data in an existing request.

94e0679ddb38d64c8c725e64e00a2ce6a7cd1279.translated: #### __INLINE_CODE_0__を使用したオンデマンドデータ送信

metadata.original: #### Sending data on-demand using __INLINE_CODE_0__

5b473349b86a73c4637197ed445ff948c6ccae3d.original: You may wish to send your data to the server immediately, rather than waiting for a Store API request to be made. This may be desired if the data may update the cart, for example adding fees, changing which shipping methods are available, or changing the tax rates.
5b473349b86a73c4637197ed445ff948c6ccae3d.translated: Store APIリクエストが行われるのを待たずに、すぐにデータをサーバーに送信したい場合があります。例えば、料金の追加、利用可能な配送方法の変更、税率の変更などです。

metadata.original: You may wish to send your data to the server immediately, rather than waiting for a Store API request to be made. This may be desired if the data may update the cart, for example adding fees, changing which shipping methods are available, or changing the tax rates.

f4843c2a3139dec4d1eebd1195519ecc883ecf46.original: The [Updating the cart on-demand with the Store API](__URL_0__) document outlines how to do this.
f4843c2a3139dec4d1eebd1195519ecc883ecf46.translated: [Store [APIによるカートのオンデマンド更新](__URL_0__) ドキュメントに、この方法の概要が記載されています。

metadata.original: The [Updating the cart on-demand with the Store API](__URL_0__) document outlines how to do this.

a66764f23cb9d160ec5537566cf85c7e969cbd37.original: ## When is data sent/received in the Cart/Checkout blocks?
a66764f23cb9d160ec5537566cf85c7e969cbd37.translated: ## Cart/Checkoutブロックではいつデータを送受信しますか？

metadata.original: ## When is data sent/received in the Cart/Checkout blocks?
### Page load

85327d5b2812c09e2119ac51d939f35316c696b4.original: On page load, if the Cart or Checkout block is present, the cart state is sent along with the initial request, and is hydrated into a client-side [__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__) data store.
85327d5b2812c09e2119ac51d939f35316c696b4.translated: ページロード時に、CartまたはCheckoutブロックが存在する場合、カートの状態は最初のリクエストと一緒に送信され、クライアント側の[__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__)データストアに格納されます。

metadata.original: On page load, if the Cart or Checkout block is present, the cart state is sent along with the initial request, and is hydrated into a client-side [__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__) data store.

f54b8a35a050c5c246041b0fe1df4b9b6ceb5a2b.original: On page load, the __INLINE_CODE_0__ and __INLINE_CODE_1__ data stores are hydrated with the data from the server. The __INLINE_CODE_2__ data store is populated partly with data from the server, but needs some client-side processing to finish before all payment methods are registered there.
f54b8a35a050c5c246041b0fe1df4b9b6ceb5a2b.translated: ページロード時に、__INLINE_CODE_0__と__INLINE_CODE_1__データストアはサーバーからのデータで満たされます。__INLINE_CODE_2__データストアは、サーバーからのデータで部分的に満たされますが、すべての支払い方法がそこに登録される前に、クライアント側の処理が完了する必要があります。

metadata.original: On page load, the __INLINE_CODE_0__ and __INLINE_CODE_1__ data stores are hydrated with the data from the server. The __INLINE_CODE_2__ data store is populated partly with data from the server, but needs some client-side processing to finish before all payment methods are registered there.

7477cab5fb2dbec06df934e0818e544bd9151e88.original: ### Entering customer data into the checkout form
7477cab5fb2dbec06df934e0818e544bd9151e88.translated: ### 顧客データをチェックアウトフォームに入力する

metadata.original: ### Entering customer data into the checkout form

16462bd14badfe3ad3b7ead8d30a6be15cf0da36.original: When the shopper enters data into the form, the data is immediately written to the __INLINE_CODE_0__ data store, and a debounced method called [__INLINE_CODE_1__](__URL_0__) is called. This method sends the customer data to the server where it is persisted against the customer. The full cart is sent back as a response, and the data store is updated with this.
16462bd14badfe3ad3b7ead8d30a6be15cf0da36.translated: 買い物客がフォームにデータを入力すると、データは直ちに__INLINE_CODE_0__データストアに書き込まれ、[__INLINE_CODE_1__](__URL_0__)と呼ばれるデバウンスメソッドが呼び出されます。このメソッドは顧客データをサーバーに送信し、そこで顧客データが永続化されます。完全なカートがレスポンスとして送り返され、データストアがこれで更新されます。

metadata.original: When the shopper enters data into the form, the data is immediately written to the __INLINE_CODE_0__ data store, and a debounced method called [__INLINE_CODE_1__](__URL_0__) is called. This method sends the customer data to the server where it is persisted against the customer. The full cart is sent back as a response, and the data store is updated with this.

da0d9e8277b18290bb8b4880720c1d8ec2455696.original: This is important to note, because if any code is running on the server that modifies the customer addresses, then it will be reflected in the response.
da0d9e8277b18290bb8b4880720c1d8ec2455696.translated: サーバー上で顧客アドレスを変更するコードが実行されている場合、それがレスポンスに反映されるからである。

metadata.original: This is important to note, because if any code is running on the server that modifies the customer addresses, then it will be reflected in the response.

b9738e363b761157b2f806586e4b88e57b3afd74.original: For example, if a plugin modifies the address data to ensure all city names are capitalised, and the shopper enters "london" into the city, when the data is returned to the client, the text would change to "London" and the input field would update.
b9738e363b761157b2f806586e4b88e57b3afd74.translated: 例えば、あるプラグインが住所データを変更し、すべての都市名が大文字になるようにした場合、買い物客が都市名に "london "と入力すると、データがクライアントに返されるとき、テキストは "London "に変わり、入力フィールドは更新されます。

metadata.original: For example, if a plugin modifies the address data to ensure all city names are capitalised, and the shopper enters "london" into the city, when the data is returned to the client, the text would change to "London" and the input field would update.

8bc9c2417ab0b652429f9225fb240bea8b303c9b.original: Modifying form fields while the shopper is interacting with them is a jarring experience, so instead of making these changes while the user is interacting with the form, consider making them while processing the checkout action on the server.
8bc9c2417ab0b652429f9225fb240bea8b303c9b.translated: 買い物客がフォームを操作している最中にフォームフィールドを変更することは、不快な体験となるため、ユーザーがフォームを操作している最中に変更するのではなく、サーバー上でチェックアウトアクションを処理している最中に変更することを検討しましょう。

metadata.original: Modifying form fields while the shopper is interacting with them is a jarring experience, so instead of making these changes while the user is interacting with the form, consider making them while processing the checkout action on the server.
### Adding coupons

1fdbf4f38a7ae4fb96489a66d63551dd766e8727.original: When the shopper expands the coupon form, the state is stored locally. This kind of data is not sent to the server. The request to add the coupon is made when the shopper presses the Apply button. A Store API request is made and it returns a new cart which is then applied.
1fdbf4f38a7ae4fb96489a66d63551dd766e8727.translated: 買い物客がクーポンフォームを展開すると、その状態はローカルに保存されます。このようなデータはサーバーに送信されません。クーポンを追加するリクエストは、ショッパーが適用ボタンを押したときに行われます。Store APIリクエストが行われ、新しいカートが返され、それが適用されます。

metadata.original: When the shopper expands the coupon form, the state is stored locally. This kind of data is not sent to the server. The request to add the coupon is made when the shopper presses the Apply button. A Store API request is made and it returns a new cart which is then applied.
### Changing shipping method

07be3bd7b48718d156dc16eda5723703cc8d9ecb.original: When the shopper changes shipping method, a Store API request is made and it returns a new cart which is then applied.
07be3bd7b48718d156dc16eda5723703cc8d9ecb.translated: 買い物客が配送方法を変更すると、Store APIリクエストが行われ、新しいカートが返され、それが適用される。

metadata.original: When the shopper changes shipping method, a Store API request is made and it returns a new cart which is then applied.
### Changing payment method

76c7a385ab798e081af620287082f32ed48b0066.original: When the shopper changes payment method, it does not automatically send a Store API request to the server. If you need to update the server when the payment method is changed and before the order is placed, the correct approach would be to use [__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__).
76c7a385ab798e081af620287082f32ed48b0066.translated: 買い物客が支払い方法を変更しても、自動的にStore APIリクエストがサーバーに送信されるわけではありません。支払い方法が変更され、注文が行われる前にサーバーを更新する必要がある場合は、[__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__)を使用するのが正しい方法です。

metadata.original: When the shopper changes payment method, it does not automatically send a Store API request to the server. If you need to update the server when the payment method is changed and before the order is placed, the correct approach would be to use [__INLINE_CODE_0__](__URL_0__).

8bd26f22663352a4942788d8d6ca368dd9c7db80.translated: ### オーダーノートの追加・編集

metadata.original: ### Adding/editing order notes

ee0f41d15663988d14b979bb6889875daf884752.original: Adding or editing order notes is stored locally on the client, these notes are not sent to the server until the shopper submits the checkout form.
ee0f41d15663988d14b979bb6889875daf884752.translated: 注文メモの追加や編集はクライアント上でローカルに保存され、これらのメモは買い物客がチェックアウトフォームを送信するまでサーバーには送信されません。

metadata.original: Adding or editing order notes is stored locally on the client, these notes are not sent to the server until the shopper submits the checkout form.

82b6399807e943590a2908e2f9cdb8723f77b4cc.original: The items listed in the Checkout section above also apply to the Cart block (besides changing payment method, the shopper cannot select their payment method on the Cart block unless it's an express payment method, which behaves differently and is implemented entirely client-side).
82b6399807e943590a2908e2f9cdb8723f77b4cc.translated: 上記のチェックアウトのセクションに記載されている項目は、カートブロックにも当てはまります（支払い方法を変更する以外に、買い物客はカートブロック上で支払い方法を選択することはできません。）

metadata.original: The items listed in the Checkout section above also apply to the Cart block (besides changing payment method, the shopper cannot select their payment method on the Cart block unless it's an express payment method, which behaves differently and is implemented entirely client-side).

325413adecb7ecada7c15ea84f1838914d4e7ce2.original: ### Changing item quantity, adding, or removing items
325413adecb7ecada7c15ea84f1838914d4e7ce2.translated: ### 商品の数量変更、追加、削除

metadata.original: ### Changing item quantity, adding, or removing items

495e1f7a4fa20170204bdbeb01db651451b875ec.original: When the shopper updates an item's quantity, removes an item from their cart, or adds an item (e.g. from the Cart cross-sells block) a Store API request is made. The local cart is updated with the response.
495e1f7a4fa20170204bdbeb01db651451b875ec.translated: 買い物客が商品の数量を更新したり、カートから商品を削除したり、商品を追加したりする場合（例：カートのクロスセルブロックから）、Store APIリクエストが行われます。ローカルカートはレスポンスで更新されます。

metadata.original: When the shopper updates an item's quantity, removes an item from their cart, or adds an item (e.g. from the Cart cross-sells block) a Store API request is made. The local cart is updated with the response.
### Using the shipping calculator

b6f1ebe88701e3b58fbdad13d82731b6f2cbce36.original: This behaves the same way as the address forms in the Checkout block, however the address in the shipping calculator is only sent to the server if the postcode is valid, and all required fields have values.
b6f1ebe88701e3b58fbdad13d82731b6f2cbce36.translated: これはチェックアウトブロックの住所フォームと同じように動作しますが、配送計算機の住所は、郵便番号が有効で、すべての必須フィールドに値がある場合にのみサーバーに送信されます。

metadata.original: This behaves the same way as the address forms in the Checkout block, however the address in the shipping calculator is only sent to the server if the postcode is valid, and all required fields have values.
# Slot and fill

d9aadead5e8aac2c88747d5c61e6210b4cca6271.original: You added custom data to the [Store API](__URL_0__). You changed several strings using [Checkout filters](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/filters-in-cart-and-checkout/). Now you want to render your own components in specific places in the Cart and Checkout.
d9aadead5e8aac2c88747d5c61e6210b4cca6271.translated: ストアAPI](__URL_0__)にカスタムデータを追加しました。Checkout filters](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/filters-in-cart-and-checkout/)を使用して、いくつかの文字列を変更しました。ここで、カートとチェックアウトの特定の場所に独自のコンポーネントをレンダリングしたいとします。

metadata.original: You added custom data to the [Store API](__URL_0__). You changed several strings using [Checkout filters](/docs/block-development/extensible-blocks/cart-and-checkout-blocks/filters-in-cart-and-checkout/). Now you want to render your own components in specific places in the Cart and Checkout.
## Solution

9223b12708546255ad8ae206fee4cb26585e6183.original: Slot and Fill are a pair of components that add the possibility to render your own HTML in pre-defined places in the Cart and Checkout. Your component will get access to contextual data and will get re-rendered when needed.
9223b12708546255ad8ae206fee4cb26585e6183.translated: SlotとFillは、カートとチェックアウトのあらかじめ定義された場所に独自のHTMLをレンダリングする可能性を追加するコンポーネントのペアです。あなたのコンポーネントはコンテキストデータにアクセスし、必要に応じて再レンダリングされます。

metadata.original: Slot and Fill are a pair of components that add the possibility to render your own HTML in pre-defined places in the Cart and Checkout. Your component will get access to contextual data and will get re-rendered when needed.

7dfcd65b1eb4f30d235774b106966a90d4765c61.original: A _Slot_ is a place in the Cart and Checkout that can render an indefinite number of external components.
7dfcd65b1eb4f30d235774b106966a90d4765c61.translated: スロットとは、カートとチェックアウトの中にある、不特定多数の外部コンポーネントを表示できる場所のことです。

metadata.original: A _Slot_ is a place in the Cart and Checkout that can render an indefinite number of external components.

365fa3b0991c03254312814550262b18947d40e1.original: A _Fill_ is the component provided by third-party developers to render inside a _Slot_.
365fa3b0991c03254312814550262b18947d40e1.translated: Fill_は、_Slot_の中にレンダリングするためにサードパーティの開発者によって提供されるコンポーネントです。

metadata.original: A _Fill_ is the component provided by third-party developers to render inside a _Slot_.

8d6da13ddc425ccc80b401a67fd2d4e6ef914b3e.original: Slot and Fill use WordPress' API, and you can learn more about how they work in [the Slot and Fill documentation.](__URL_0__).
8d6da13ddc425ccc80b401a67fd2d4e6ef914b3e.translated: SlotとFillはWordPressのAPIを使用しており、その仕組みについては[SlotとFillのドキュメント](__URL_0__)をご覧ください。

metadata.original: Slot and Fill use WordPress' API, and you can learn more about how they work in [the Slot and Fill documentation.](__URL_0__).

7777fe8089a23f881fbf2ede91cbf23d8b5364ab.translated: __INLINE_CODE_0__を使用して、プラグインの名前空間、コンポーネントの__INLINE_CODE_1__、そして__INLINE_CODE_2__のスコープを入力します。scopeの値は常に__INLINE_CODE_3__でなければなりません。

## Requirements

4013a1a0b305ad38f9a04b006e3a032d79f7073c.original: For this to work, your script must be enqueued after Cart and Checkout. You can follow the [IntegrationInterface](__URL_0__) documentation for enqueueing your script.

metadata.original: For this to work, your script must be enqueued after Cart and Checkout. You can follow the [IntegrationInterface](__URL_0__) documentation for enqueueing your script.

bba58c6cd92fdb07996b9268ad22e213f02d7130.original: # How to Add Additional Fields to the WooCommerce Checkout Block
bba58c6cd92fdb07996b9268ad22e213f02d7130.translated: # WooCommerceチェックアウトブロックに追加フィールドを追加する方法

metadata.original: # How to Add Additional Fields to the WooCommerce Checkout Block

d3c024717073524d3a7b3dec1de6be051bc70dbf.original: This feature requires a minimum version of WooCommerce 8.9.0
d3c024717073524d3a7b3dec1de6be051bc70dbf.translated: この機能にはWooCommerce 8.9.0以上が必要です。

metadata.original: This feature requires a minimum version of WooCommerce 8.9.0

131c82577df5af4a6dd5c7191748286ea5e8e035.original: The WooCommerce Checkout Block provides a powerful API for developers to add additional fields to collect information from customers during the checkout process. Whether you need to gather special delivery instructions, business details, or marketing preferences, additional checkout fields make it easy to extend your store’s functionality.
131c82577df5af4a6dd5c7191748286ea5e8e035.translated: WooCommerceチェックアウトブロックは、チェックアウトプロセス中に顧客から情報を収集するためのフィールドを追加するための強力なAPIを開発者に提供します。特別な配送指示、ビジネスの詳細、またはマーケティングのプリファレンスを収集する必要があるかどうかにかかわらず、追加のチェックアウトフィールドは、あなたのストアの機能を簡単に拡張することができます。

metadata.original: The WooCommerce Checkout Block provides a powerful API for developers to add additional fields to collect information from customers during the checkout process. Whether you need to gather special delivery instructions, business details, or marketing preferences, additional checkout fields make it easy to extend your store’s functionality.

7f086ec320ac40dc57697a63c094353db5950d42.original: In this guide, we’ll walk through the process of adding your own additional fields to your checkout form and show you practical examples you can implement right away.
7f086ec320ac40dc57697a63c094353db5950d42.translated: このガイドでは、チェックアウトフォームに独自の追加フィールドを追加する手順を説明し、すぐに実装できる実践的な例を紹介します。

metadata.original: In this guide, we’ll walk through the process of adding your own additional fields to your checkout form and show you practical examples you can implement right away.
## Getting Started

ba8eaa5f535c65918efd0a68fdf374be8e2906e0.original: To add additional checkout fields, you’ll use the __INLINE_CODE_0__ function. This should be called after the __INLINE_CODE_1__ action to ensure WooCommerce is fully loaded.

4bcdff2bd375f6d73aafa0db8117850eb5d1d38e.translated: これらのフィールドは、配送先と請求先の両方のフォームに表示されます。これらのフィールドは、顧客と注文の両方に保存されるため、リピーターが再入力する必要はありません。

## Next Steps

a26a9f7043236b99af5b4687c5b8c93f35921bd3.original: You now have the foundation for adding additional checkout fields to your WooCommerce store using the checkout block.
a26a9f7043236b99af5b4687c5b8c93f35921bd3.translated: これで、チェックアウトブロックを使用してWooCommerceストアにチェックアウトフィールドを追加するための基礎ができました。

fd51987c82b51bc00218cdac23f353c0f974636d.original: The additional checkout fields API provides a robust foundation for customizing your checkout experience while maintaining compatibility with WooCommerce’s block-based checkout system. Start with simple fields and gradually add more sophisticated validation and conditional logic as your needs grow.
fd51987c82b51bc00218cdac23f353c0f974636d.translated: 追加チェックアウトフィールドAPIは、WooCommerceのブロックベースのチェックアウトシステムとの互換性を維持しながら、チェックアウトエクスペリエンスをカスタマイズするための堅牢な基盤を提供します。シンプルなフィールドから始め、ニーズの成長に合わせて徐々に高度なバリデーションや条件ロジックを追加していきましょう。

metadata.original: The additional checkout fields API provides a robust foundation for customizing your checkout experience while maintaining compatibility with WooCommerce’s block-based checkout system. Start with simple fields and gradually add more sophisticated validation and conditional logic as your needs grow.

cfcef26ec8ba963acf9fee212aeff9bac5929582.original: # How to Make Your WooCommerce Additional Checkout Fields Conditionally Visible in the Checkout Block

f640535739f09fdbbab2318cfd7919b8159d8ec8.original: Conditional visibility allows you to create smart, adaptive checkout forms that only show relevant fields when needed, reducing form clutter and improving the customer experience.
f640535739f09fdbbab2318cfd7919b8159d8ec8.translated: 条件付きの可視性により、必要なときだけ関連フィールドを表示するスマートで適応性のあるチェックアウトフォームを作成することができ、フォームの乱雑さを減らし、カスタマーエクスペリエンスを向上させます。

metadata.original: Conditional visibility allows you to create smart, adaptive checkout forms that only show relevant fields when needed, reducing form clutter and improving the customer experience.

2b7f049ab93fe0d67e3c54710d7c1037107b0891.translated: ## なぜ条件付き可視性を使うのか？

metadata.original: ## Why Use Conditional Visibility?

f21bea65f54a0bae5f89651d45254d0f4f1abe54.translated: 条件付きフィールドはあなたを助ける：

metadata.original: Conditional fields help you:

2a0d4a2904dfbdc4e56ef0b50e9769f7e15a9469.original:
* Reduce form complexity by hiding irrelevant fields
* Create dynamic checkout flows based on customer selections
* Show specialized fields only for specific products or customer types
* Improve conversion rates with cleaner, more focused forms
* Collect contextual information that's only relevant in certain situations
2a0d4a2904dfbdc4e56ef0b50e9769f7e15a9469.translated:
* 無関係なフィールドを非表示にすることで、フォームの複雑さを軽減
* 顧客の選択に基づいたダイナミックなチェックアウトフローの作成
* 特定の商品や顧客タイプにのみ特化したフィールドを表示する
* フォームをよりすっきりとさせ、コンバージョン率を向上させる
* 特定の状況でのみ関連するコンテキスト情報を収集する

metadata.original:
* Reduce form complexity by hiding irrelevant fields
* Create dynamic checkout flows based on customer selections
* Show specialized fields only for specific products or customer types
* Improve conversion rates with cleaner, more focused forms
* Collect contextual information that's only relevant in certain situations

2a994773f886270c39b5c72ce31d5ecdb48008d4.original: Conditional visibility transforms static checkout forms into dynamic, intelligent interfaces that adapt to your customers’ needs. Combined with the basic additional fields from our previous post, you can create sophisticated checkout experiences that collect exactly the right information at exactly the right time.
2a994773f886270c39b5c72ce31d5ecdb48008d4.translated: 条件付きの可視性は、静的なチェックアウトフォームを、顧客のニーズに適応するダイナミックでインテリジェントなインターフェイスに変えます。前回の記事で紹介した基本的な追加フィールドと組み合わせることで、適切な情報を適切なタイミングで収集する洗練されたチェックアウト体験を作成できます。

metadata.original: Conditional visibility transforms static checkout forms into dynamic, intelligent interfaces that adapt to your customers’ needs. 4c7567a7f06b1e5ff6383ebc1018d1f68e675619.original: Start experimenting with simple conditions and gradually build more complex logic as you become comfortable with the JSON Schema syntax. Your customers will appreciate the cleaner, more relevant checkout experience!
